Package com.github.maxopoly.angeliacore.util

Class HorizontalField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxopoly.angeliacore.util.HorizontalField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Location>
    public class HorizontalField
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Location>
    Utility class for handling rectangular fields. Allows iterating over a field at configurable intervalls

      • isAtSide

        public boolean isAtSide​(MovementDirection side,
                        Location loc)
        Checks whether the given location is at the given side of the field, meaning a location one block further into the given movement direction than the given location would be outside of the field, but the given location itself is still inside
        Parameters:
        side - Movement direction for which to check, must be a cardinal movement and not UP or DOWN
        loc - Location to check
        Returns:
        True if the location is at the given side of the field (on the inside), false if not

        Returns:
